document_data.name: ''Pendant of Ashaba''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Pendant of Ashaba''''' was a magical pendant that was created by [[Ashaba]], the first lord of [[Shadowdale]], and was used to determine the rightful lord of the dale.
document_data.Description: It was a [[silver]] crescent moon with horns that pointed upwards. Originally the pendant hung from a plain string, but this was replaced by a silver chain that was made by [[Sylun√© Silverhand]].
document_data.Magical powers: The pendant, upon command, said in the voice of Ashaba: "The bearer of the token be the one and true lord of Shadowdale". It could also detect alignment a little like the ''[[know alignment]]'' spell, but it could only detect very strongly aligned individuals such as [[paladin]]s. The limitations of the pendant in this regard were thought to be related to the limitations of its creator, Ashaba.
